title: I’M BACK! The Economy Isn’t Bad, You’re Just Stupid!!!
description:
CROWDER IS BACK! And so is the American recession — or maybe "recession." It depends on whether you believe Joe Biden or every definition of the word since the 1940s. There's a lot to unpack. Also, they're apparently arresting people for social media posts in England now. And just when you thought NYC subways couldn't get any worse ... it's an orgy! #biden #recession #trans
